segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just used to chaos or if she’s really that unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’d be yelling at them to get down, but she’s just standing there like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so strange, like a snapshot of controlled chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’s going to be shocked when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t decide if she’s impressively calm or just completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, this is one of the most unusual kitchen scenes I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon, just to see her reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR
